Class MainSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers.ControllerGUI
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.controllers.MainSceneController
public class MainSceneController extends ControllerGUI
Controller class for managing the main game scene

    • updateBookPane

      public void updateBookPane(GameImmutable model, String nickname)
      Updates the book display pane based on the player's book matrix, showing cards and managing layout dynamically.
      Parameters:
      model - The GameImmutable object containing the game state.
      nickname - The nickname of the player whose book is being updated.

    • findSubMatrix

      public int[] findSubMatrix()
      Finds the minimum and maximum indices of rows and columns containing non-null cards in the bookMatrix. Returns an array containing these indices in the order: [minRow, minColumn, maxRow, maxColumn].
      Returns:
      An array of integers representing the limits of the submatrix containing non-null cards.

    • chooseCellClick

      public void chooseCellClick(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the click event on selectable cells in the book pane, allowing the player to choose a cell for card placement.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - The MouseEvent generated by clicking on a cell in the book pane.

    • highlightChooseCell

      public void highlightChooseCell(GameImmutable model, String nickname)
      Highlights the selectable cells in the book pane, allowing the player to choose a cell for card placement.
      Parameters:
      model - The GameImmutable object containing the game state.
      nickname - The nickname of the player whose book is being highlighted for cell selection.
